title: Exploring the Interplay of problematic pornography use, sexism, and rape myth acceptance: An Italian cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Benedetta Barchielli, Clarissa Cricenti, Giulia Lausi, Alessandro Quaglieri, Emanuela Mari, Gabriele Rocca, Arije Antinori, Anna Maria Giannini, Stefano Ferracuti
